bioAsHtml: Wikipedian, developer, sysop, CTO/Delivery at Transparency Rights Management, Sylvain works in a full Scala environment (Play!, Akka, Scalding) to improve the collection of music publishing rights.

acceptedTalks.title: Akka Typed : pour que le typage fort ne reste pas lettre morte

bio: Wikipedian, developer, sysop, CTO/Delivery at Transparency Rights Management, Sylvain works in a full Scala environment (Play!, Akka, Scalding) to improve the collection of music publishing rights.
